item.author: Author
item.description: Peer-reviewed paper 2024 Hiroki Kanagawa, Takafumi Moriya, Yusuke Ijima, “Pre-training Neural Transducer-based Streaming Voice Conversion for Faster Convergence and Alignment-free Training,” Proc. Interspeech 2024, pp. 4393-4397, Aug. 2024 @ Kos, Greece. 2023 Hiroki Kanagawa, Takafumi Moriya, Yusuke Ijima, “VC-T: Streaming Voice Conversion Based on Neural Transducer,” Proc.
